snippet.description: Pita pocket bread is a fun and tasty bread to make for sandwiches. This recipe makes 8, super soft pita breads.

snippet.title: Whole Wheat Pita Bread Recipe \- Middle Eastern Food at About.com
snippet.description: Whole wheat pita bread is perfect for those looking to add more wheat to their diet. This recipe contains both white and wheat flour and is so simple to make!
